edge_1: In the beginning, Jonathan is enamored by his female teammate Aurora and keeps their relationship a secret. The two keep their relationship a secret and refuse to put a stop to rumors that Aurora is a lesbian.
edge_2: Jonathan's team promoter, Alexi Petrovich, has a vested interest in keeping the game popular through planned gory "accidents". Jonathan and Ridley eventually discover this situation but want to keep their current lifestyle.
edge_3: Jonathan is described as the poster child of Rollerball promoter Alexi Petrovich.

edge_1: In the beginning, Jonathan is enamored by his female teammate Aurora and keeps their relationship a secret. The two keep their relationship a secret and refuse to put a stop to rumors that Aurora is a lesbian.
edge_2: Jonathan and Alexi are followed by Alexi's men who attack them before they can reach the Russian border. Jonathan is injured, and Ridley has to leave him behind. Alexi captures Jonathan and kills Ridley before he can cross the border. Jonathan says that he will keep working for Alexi if Aurora is traded to another team, wanting to keep her away from danger. Alexi complies, secretly transferring Aurora to the opposing team for the next match.
edge_3: Alexi secretly transfers Aurora to the opposing team for the next match in return for Jonathan's cooperation.
